official_title: A resolution to honor and thank Federal Highway Administrator Ray Barnhart for his dedicated efforts to improve the Nation's highway system.

summary.text: Honors Ray A. Barnhart, retiring Federal Highway Administrator, for his efforts to preserve and improve the Federal-Aid Highway System.
